medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presents with 36 hours of pain that initially started as periumbilical and then localized to the right lower quadrant yesterday. Pain has resolved with only mild discomfort currently. Associated symptoms include anorexia, nausea, vomiting, and one episode of watery diarrhea yesterday. Denies fevers, chills, or previous episodes of abdominal pain.
